settings.title: Shipping Information
settings.text:
I take great care in packaging each piece to ensure it arrives safely. All pottery is wrapped in bubble wrap and surrounded by protective padding. Most orders ship within 1-2 business days via USPS Priority Mail.

Shipping Costs:
• Orders under $75: $12 flat rate
• Orders $75 and above: Free shipping
• Local pickup available in Lake Stevens, WA by appointment

settings.title: Returns & Exchanges
settings.text:
Your satisfaction is important to me. If you're not completely happy with your purchase, I'm here to help.

Damaged Items:
If your pottery arrives damaged, please email me photos within 48 hours. I'll send a replacement or provide a full refund, including return shipping costs.

Returns:
Undamaged items may be returned within 14 days of delivery for a full refund. Items must be in original condition. Customer pays return shipping unless the item was damaged or defective.

settings.title: Careful Packaging
settings.text: Each piece is individually wrapped in bubble wrap and surrounded by protective padding. I use sturdy boxes and clearly mark them as fragile.

settings.title: Tracking Included
settings.text: You'll receive tracking information via email once your order ships. Most orders arrive within 2-3 business days.

settings.title: Local Pickup
settings.text: Save on shipping and see pieces in person! Local pickup is available by appointment in Lake Stevens, WA.

settings.title: Questions?
settings.text: If you have any questions about shipping or returns, please don't hesitate to reach out. I'm here to help ensure you have a great experience with your pottery purchase.
